sentences.en: Frank : Are you going to apply for a room a single - sex dorm or a coed dorm?
sentences.cn: 你要申请单一性别的宿舍房间还是男女混合的宿舍?

sentences.en: I want to go to a coed school.
sentences.cn: 我要上男女同校的学校.

sentences.en: Instead of coed dormitory, I chose to live in a fraternity house off campus.
sentences.cn: 我选择住在校外的兄弟会宿舍代替男女生宿舍.
你们学校是男女合校 吗 ?

sentences.en: Then came the 1970 s, when male and female students started crossing paths in coed dormitories.
sentences.cn: 到了上世纪70年代, 才开始答应不同性别的学生住同一幢宿舍楼.

trans.tran_en: using a system in which students of both sexes are educated together

trans.tran_cn: <过时，美，非正>（男女同校大学中的）女大学生
trans.tran_en: a woman student at a university
